title: What happens if Apple bought Samsung and Google? - Quora

response.answer_text: The government would never allow such a merger, and besides, Alphabet isn’t dumb enough to sell Google because it’s their most profitable asset. Even thought Apple has over 1 trillion dollars in revenues and profits, Alphabet also has 1 trillion dollars. Sorry, but Apple will never get their hands on Google! As for Samsung, Apple would need approval from both the US and Korean government and it’s very unlikely that will happen. Samsung is a Korean tech giant and would not let Apple buy them anyways. Although it be cheaper to buy Samsung than Google. It’s very unlikely Apple will buy Google or Samsung
